long_description: we are a family-run financial advice firm with our clients' financial well-being at the heart of everything we do. from pensions and investments to mortgages and insurance, folan brookes can help you and your family with every aspect of personal finance. we complement this by using the latest technology to ensure your experience is streamlined and straightforward. we also offer guidance throughout the process, whether that is buying your first home, re-mortgaging to secure a more competitive deal, or investing in a second home or buy-to-let property. we believe tailored insurance advice goes hand in hand with mortgage advice. whether you're buying your first home, becoming a parent, investing for the future, or approaching retirement, a carefully thought out financial plan can make a difference. our clients' financial well-being and best interests are central to everything we do. with over 30 years of combined experience in providing professional and sound financial advice, folan brookes can help shape the future you've always dreamed of.

short_description: folan brookes financial consultants is a mortgage broker based in oxford, united kingdom.
long_description:
folan brookes financial consultants is a forward thinking, family run business, with combined experience of over 30 years in the industry, we pride ourselves on our exceptional expertise in the mortgage, protection and financial planning market. building lasting relationships with all our clients and providing bespoke advice tailored to your personal circumstances. at folan brookes, we welcome the advances in technology within the industry, our ethos is to keep the advice process simple, complemented with modern technology, working smarter and faster, allowing us to spend more, valuable time with our clients, doing what we do best. with a combination of expert advice and first class service we aim to make your experience straightforward and stress free. we believe that financial planning can serve your present and fuel your future. what services can we offermortgages - we offer an extensive range of mortgages from a wide range of providers, from high street banks and building societies to specialist lenders. we offer help and guidance throughout the whole process, whether that's - buying your first home - re-mortgaging to secure a more competitive deal -investing in second home/buy to let or portfolio. insurance -the cornerstone of any good financial planning. we believe any decisions about your future should always consider how you can protect your finances - home - family and business, in the event of the unexpected. financial planning - our professional financial planning service focuses on you. we consider your needs, wants and aspirations, then create a cashflow and investment strategy to meet your future financial goals.'folan brookes financial consultants limited is an appointed representative of the openwork partnership, a trading style of openwork limited which is authorised and regulated by the financial conduct authority. your home may be repossessed if you do not keep up repayments on your mortgage

long_description: we are a family-run, progressive mortgage and insurance advice firm with over 15 years experience. we have access to an extensive range of mortgage lenders, including well known high street banks and building societies, and some smaller, specialist lenders. at folan brookes we pride ourselves in simplifying mortgages and the whole mortgage process with personal, professional and quality advice. we specialise in mortgages, remortgaging, first time buyers, buy to let mortgages, help to buy scheme, shared ownership, self employed mortgages, contractors, cis mortgages, second homes. we are passionate about getting to know our clients and their families and ensure their investment is protected, that's why we also advise on relevant insurance.
